summary: With over 14 years of experience in Software Engineering, I have brought projects from mock-ups to production using JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. As a full stack development expert, I have always strived to deliver reliable and functional products that cause a wow reaction at first glance. As a team player, I always look to help others and learn from them. For me, Software Engineering is a philosophy, not a simple job.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Led the continuous development of clients' dApps using SvelteKit and TypeScript.
Worked on building core functionalities of the Unchained platform using TypeScript.
Developed APIs for dApps integrated with MongoDB and PostgreSQL.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Led the migration of SonarCloud issues screen to MIUI using React, improving the user experience and performance.
Developed critical features for CaYC methodology and Clean Code Taxonomy using React and TypeScript, making our users more informed about the code quality of their projects.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Enhanced various mobile application functionalities using Meteor.js and Svelte, enhancing rent processes and stabilizing Bluetooth.
Published the app on leading stores, amplifying customer outreach.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Led multiple valuable contributions into developing Anibis messenger using React and TypeScript, granting constant improvements to the user experience.
Led the migration of the messaging service to a different messaging provider, improving the performance and stability of the application.
Performed as a Scrum Master for the Aldrin squad, ensuring the team's communication and productivity.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed React components for Adobe Content Manager for a global client on the energy sector, giving the content team more flexibility to manage the content of their clients.
Developed a Python application for a client on the video surveillance sector, ensuring easy data analysis and reporting.
Implemented features for the SkyQ application of British Sky Broadcasting, a global client on the media sector, improving performance, reliability and user experience.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Built the company's main front-end application using React and Redux, providing a robust and scalable platform for the company's first clients.
Launched the application into beta testing, enabling the company to start receiving clients and revenue.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Developed features in JavaScript and jQuery for the Landing Pages squad, improving code quality and performance.
Contributed to the migration of the landing pages editor to a WYSIWYG editor, providing a more user-friendly editor for the users.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Implemented features for a JIRA plugin for testing management using Angular.js, giving the company an edge in the market.
Contributed to the core feature of testing suites, allowing the company to outperform competitors.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Everyone starts somewhere, right?
Developed key features for a file processing tool for financial analysis using Java, further enhancing the company's reputation in the market.
Contributed heavily as a pioneer on JavaScript and CSS rich interfaces, giving users a more intuitive and user-friendly experience.

education.degree: Diploma in Software Engineering and Development
